short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feel free to read Blog articles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blog Comportable View, a simple Chrome extension that helps you read blogs comfortably.

In particular, it helps you read locked articles by unlocking them on the medium site.

This small tool was created at the suggestion of our team leader to solve the inconvenience of reading various blogs.
This allows you to explore different content more freely from different blogs. I hope even a small contribution will help you with your knowledge search journey.
